title: Lagoon Luxury in the Cook Islands
description: Unwind and soak up the Polynesian beachfront vibes of one of the Cook Islands’ finest resorts with five nights at the award-winning Pacific Resort Aitutaki. Includes return airport transfers, daily breakfasts, exotic dining experiences, a bottle of wine, complimentary kayaking, snorkelling and bike hire, and more.
offer_address: Amuri Sports Field, Aitutaki, Cook Islands

title: Lagoon Romance in the Cook Islands
description: Escape to the unspoiled beauty of the Cook Islands with a stay at the romantic Pacific Resort Aitutaki. The Cook Island’s only member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, this multi-award-winning resort offers luxurious boutique bungalows with stunning views of the azure ocean. Experience sheer romance and relaxation for two, with daily breakfasts, select gourmet dinners, return airport transfers and more included.
